name: Xtrem Super Car Racing Sim Pro
name_original: Xtrem Super Car Racing Sim Pro
description:
Xtrem super car racer sim 2017 is the most unique and upcoming car simulator battle which seems deficient without you and your participation will complete it. … Dream like adventure in a wonderful atmosphere with all essential qualities of real car racing experience.

Undoubtedly an incredible racing car game which have attractive environment and marvelous racing track, the game is no less than a battle where the riders disguised themselves in most attractive warriors dress. The super race is not difficult to play with stinging craft it just demands continuous attention and some precautions.

Xtrem racer sim is the unusual car race simulator of 2017 which has been formatted in the city with alluring location. It constitute with plenty of cars, abundance of turns, arousing sound, excitement , Natural crowd and endanger of death. Moreover although it a simulator but the presence of city traffic and the audience in the race embellish it with a tinge of reality. It provokes you to take part in the excellent super race.

Racer Sim is well refined formula game which make it possible for you to take a challenge of driving, the rider has to run the car with a passion of winning the game as the running track is full your rivals, drift your car horribly from the crew and prove that you’re the best racer and the super hero. Your task is to run car speedily with running craft out of the car traffic, you need to show stunt to beat the rest of the cars, running to cross you.

Actually your main objective is to meet the racing end line by drifting car before the access of anyone else. Approach the winning line by crossing your opponents and your victory lies in racing craft.

Features

• Amazing simulator car race
• Fantastic 3D graphics
• Smooth captivating animation
• Collection of racing cars
• Touch of acute sound
• Arousing atmosphere with crowd
• Breathtaking racing track
• Easy to play
